summary: A conversion of the LeatherBound Huntress Armour by Shadowtroop and DeannaRose24 for UNPB-BBP. It requires Shadowtroop\'s original mod.
descriptionHtml:
A conversion of the LeatherBound Huntress Armour by Shadowtroop and DeannaRose24 for UNPB-BBP. It requires Shadowtroop\'s original mod.

[youtube]hfFxwndw_rk[/youtube]
Thanks to MrKrossFaith for this video

English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.

Required mods (don\'t forget to endorse them):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11143]LeatherBound Huntress Armour[/url]
The UNPB body replacer with BBP support: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/]Troublemakers Clothing[/url]

Does not work without BBP.
There is no weight slider support, only max weight.

Installation:
First install the required mods
Use NMM and overwrite when asked. Say no to upgrade.
Manual installation: open archive, extract the esp file and the meshes folder into skyrim\\data folder and overwrite when asked.

Credits and thanks:
Shadowtroop and DeannaRose24 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11143]LeatherBound Huntress Armour[/url]
calyps and xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: belisariu
